attributes.action: Abolish Job Seekers Allowance has Taxable income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to start a petition to have the JSA  has Taxable income  Abolished. This is a benefit as this is a measely £60 approx per week I find this uttlerly disgusting to find I will be taxed on this No other benefit I know off is  taxed How  are people suppose to live on this.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
